complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Design and Implement Database Schema with Prisma
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the schema design into entity-specific modeling, relationship mapping, constraint definition, migration setup, and seed data generation. For each subtask, specify the models involved, required constraints, and test cases for validation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves designing a foundational database schema with multiple entities, complex relationships, and constraints. It requires careful planning to ensure referential integrity, proper indexing, and migration safety. The use of Prisma ORM adds a layer of abstraction, but the underlying complexity of modeling real-world relationships and ensuring data consistency is high. The recommended subtasks align with best practices for schema-first development and provide clear separation of concerns.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Integrate Cloud Storage and CDN (Cloudflare R2)
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand the integration into SDK setup, upload/download utilities, hierarchical organization, CDN URL generation, lifecycle policies, and provider abstraction. For each subtask, detail the API interactions, error handling strategies, and test scenarios for both unit and integration testing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Integrating cloud storage and CDN involves multiple technical components, including SDK configuration, file handling, URL generation, and lifecycle management. The abstraction layer for future provider flexibility adds architectural complexity. While the individual components are well-documented, the integration and abstraction require careful design to ensure reliability and maintainability. The recommended subtasks cover all critical aspects of cloud storage integration.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand the utilities module into validation, error handling, and logging submodules. For each subtask, specify the libraries to use (e.g., Zod, Pino), the types of utilities to implement, and the test cases for edge scenarios.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Developing shared utilities is a foundational task that impacts the entire codebase. While the individual utilities (validation, error handling, logging) are relatively straightforward, ensuring they are reusable, well-tested, and maintainable across modules requires careful design. The recommended subtasks cover the core aspects of utility development and provide a clear path for implementation.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the authentication module into password hashing, JWT management, login/refresh endpoints, middleware, client token generation, and session management. For each subtask, detail the security requirements, token handling, and test cases for authentication flows.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Authentication and authorization are critical security components that require careful implementation to prevent vulnerabilities. The module involves multiple layers, including password hashing, token management, middleware, and session tracking. The complexity is high due to the need for secure coding practices, proper error handling, and comprehensive testing. The recommended subtasks cover all essential aspects of authentication and authorization.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Build Photo Upload Pipeline with Direct-to-R2 and Cloudflare Images
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand the pipeline into presigned URL generation, upload confirmation, Cloudflare Images integration, delta sync detection, and Photo model updates. For each subtask, detail the API endpoints, authentication, and test cases for direct-to-storage upload patterns.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Building a direct-to-storage photo upload pipeline with presigned URLs and on-demand image transformations involves multiple architectural components. The complexity includes secure presigned URL generation with proper expiration, upload confirmation with R2 file verification, Cloudflare Images API integration for on-demand transformations, delta sync logic for efficient plugin uploads, and database schema updates. While this approach eliminates server-side image processing (Sharp), it introduces new complexities around client-to-storage patterns, URL signing, and third-party image transformation service integration. The recommended subtasks cover all critical aspects of the modern, serverless-friendly upload architecture.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the album management module into CRUD endpoints, client invitation system, status management, resubmission control, and business rules validation. For each subtask, detail the API endpoints, business logic, and test cases for edge scenarios.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Album management involves multiple business rules, client interactions, and state transitions. The module requires careful design to ensure data consistency, proper validation, and user-friendly workflows. The complexity is high due to the need for robust business logic and integration with other modules. The recommended subtasks cover all critical aspects of album management.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand the selection module into gallery display, selection/deselection logic, submission flow, deadline enforcement, and read-only mode. For each subtask, specify the API endpoints, business logic, and test cases for edge scenarios.

The module requires careful design to ensure data consistency, proper validation, and user-friendly workflows.
